amendment.description: To require reports on diversity and inclusion in the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2391 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2391 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4186-4187) To require reports on diversity and inclusion in the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2391 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2391 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
